ygData.subject: Re: Recruitment
ygData.msgSnippet: we havent put down on blood whats the requirement, but have ssaid that when 3 offiers agree to the recuitment then go ahead. I think u have to give some face
ygData.messageBody:
we havent put down on blood whats the requirement, but have ssaid that when
3 offiers agree to the recuitment then go ahead. I think u have to give some
face to our guild mistress even though She/He/it may not be one of the 3
officers that agreed. GIve her face to make up for the flat chest. make her
happy lor. Her parang is still very sharp.....also u may need the chestnut
thingy from her too.

I support u on your recuitment. Your RL kakis mah. If u cannot recuit your
own RL friend then where got face?
So u have my "approve" vote :)

BiBi aka Yiyang

ps. ok u can give me the 100pp NOW for supporting u liao.


-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

Subject: [sg-everquest] Recruitment


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
